name: Space Flotilla
description:
Overview
 --------------------------

Play as a lone space ship facing endless flocks of alien ships, maneuvering through randomly generated debris in order to survive as long as possible! However, beware of the Overlord ships, a much tougher enemy that commands surrounding ships to either defend itself or launch an attack on to your ship!

Controls
--------------------------

Ship movementWASD keysAimingMouse positionFiringLeft mouse clickHyper-beamSpace if ability is chargedPauseEscape key
